item.description:
How to sign up

Follow this link and click the join league option:

http://football.fantasysports.yahoo.com/

Under the "Join a League" option enter the league id and password.

Our league id is: 634255

The password is: providence

Enter that and you will be good to go.

See you on the (fantasy) field.

==============================================

Football season is almost here and what better way to get into the game than with a full season of Fantasy Football?

For the uninitiated, you draft a team with an offense of 8 and a defense. Then, you hope your score is higher than everyone else. Games usually provide a ton of suspense and action and bring joy and excitement to otherwise drab fall weekends.

Our draft will take place on September 3 at 10:30 pm (only time available on that day). Figure out your draft strategy and join us in the draft room. If that sounds like too much work, just let the computer pick for you. Trust me, they can do a pretty good job.

Remember, you don't have to be good to play. It's free and the only thing at stake is bragging rights.

If you sign up, the following is requested of you:

Please make sure that you set up your team with active players every week. If there are inactive players on your roster, it ruins the fun.

Everyone is welcome, except filthy New York fans.
item.name: Newcomers Fantasy Football League
